messages:
Name: M'Baye Niang
Nationality: Senegal
Date of Birth: December 19, 1994
Position: Attacker
Current club: Sampdoria
Serie B clubs played for: Sampdoria
Sampdoria attacker M'Baye Niang was not involved in either of the two Serie B matches that his club have played so far in 2025/2026.
In the side's next Serie B game on September 13, Sampdoria face a home match against Cesena.
Last season, Niang played a combined 24 Serie B and Botola Pro games between Sampdoria (16) and Wydad Casablanca (8) and scored five goals.
Prior to moving to Sampdoria in January 2025, Niang made one league appearance in total at Gen√ßlerbirliƒüi.
